Medium: 12 lithographs (3 with embossing, collagraph and/or varnish additions), 9 soft ground etchings (8 with aquatint, lift ground aquatint, and/or collagraph), 3 lift ground aquatints, 3 pochoirs, and 3 aquatints (1 with etching)
Dimensions: page  19 7/8 x 13 15/16" (50 x 35.5 cm)  Prints: various dimensions.
Title: Declaracion Universal de Derechos Humanos
Keywords: Julio Le Parc and Rafael Canogar
